contentrichtext.text: '''Perfect Strangers''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} == Film == * [[Perfect Strangers (1945 film)|''Perfect Strangers'' (1945 film)]], a film starring Robert Donat and Deborah Kerr * [[Perfect Strangers (1950 film)|''Perfect Strangers'' (1950 film)]], a film starring Ginger Rogers * [[Perfect Strangers (1984 film)|''Perfect Strangers'' (1984 film)]], a film starring Anne Carlisle and Brad Rijn * [[Perfect Strangers (2003 film)|''Perfect Strangers'' (2003 film)]], a film starring Sam Neill * [[Perfect Strangers (2004 film)|''Perfect Strangers'' (2004 film)]], a film starring Rob Lowe and Anna Friel == Television == * [[Perfect Strangers (TV series)|''Perfect Strangers'' (TV series)]], a 1986-1993 American television sitcom * [[Perfect Strangers (TV miniseries)|''Perfect Strangers'' (TV miniseries)]], a 2001 British television drama miniseries == Music == * [[Perfect Strangers (album)|''Perfect Strangers'' (album)]], a 1984 album by Deep Purple ** [[Perfect Strangers (Deep Purple song)|"Perfect Strangers" (Deep Purple song)]] * [[Perfect Strangers (INXS song)|"Perfect Strangers" (INXS song)]] == Other uses == * ''Invincible Vol. 3: Perfect Strangers'', a trade paperback in the ''[[Invincible (comics)|Invicible]]'' comic book series ==See also== *[[Perfect Stranger (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
